newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Michigan unit performing well - NAB.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Michigan unit performing well - NAB.

text.p: National Australia Bank Ltd said on Tuesday that its U.S. unit, Michigan National Corp, was performing exceedingly well.
"They are performing exceedingly well," National's managing director Don Argus said, answering questions at a Committee for the Economic Development of Australia (CEDA) luncheon.
Argus told the luncheon the Michigan economic environment was as good any other economy for the bank to operate in with the exception of Hong Kong where margins were exceptional.

"It is as good an economic environment to run a retail banking franchise as anywhere you can go with the exception of Hong Kong where you've got the beautiful margins on housing product at the moment of about 4.8 percent," Argus said.
